m_szDocTitle: Is Stratasys Ltd. Working on Larger-Scale 3D Printing? -- The Motley Fool
m_szDocSumamry: Login Is Stratasys Ltd. Working on Larger-Scale 3D Printing? 3D printing company leader Stratasys is aiming to further penetrate the manufacturing market, according to patent application filings. Beth McKenna ( TMFMcKenna ) Feb 17, 2015 at 9:40AM If you're following the 3D printing space, you might know that neither Stratasys ( NASDAQ:SSYS ) nor 3D Systems has product or service offerings that fall into the "large-scale 3D printing" category, which is sometimes dubbed "big area additive manufacturing," or BAAM.
